title: Did people feel their views were taken into account?
analysis_commentary: The proportion of people who didnâ€™t feel they had their views taken into account hasn't changed by much over the years (from 4% in 2010 to 5% in 2013), the proportion feeling they had definitely had their views taken into account has decreased by 3%, from 75% in 2010 to 72% in 2013. Note that this question was not asked in the 2014 survey.
data_source: Care Quality Commission, Community Mental Health Survey
